revisionDesc.change: Automatic insertion of lb tags into origs to match existing lb tags in the reg
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; changed sic to surplus; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
